Pixel Pioneers (Group 7)

Avneet Sidhu

Special Development Skill Acquired: Something

Eman Elmahi

From this project, I gained valuable experience in Git and version control, which I believe will be incredibly beneficial in future collaborations and projects. Additionally, diving into the intricacies of front-end development for applications has expanded my skill set and provided me with a deeper understanding of creating user-friendly interfaces and engaging experiences

Gabriel Barnabé

One skill that I found improved dramatically was the ability to debug problems in a project quickly. I now find that finding the source of a bug is more intuitive, and I have gained a better understanding of the tools that help me achieve this goal as well. Another thing I feel I’ve gained is the understanding of the underlying reasons behind structuring things a certain way within code – that working on code given a certain structure may become more difficult later compared to other methods. Getting firsthand experience with this proved a great learning experience, and made structuring software in future projects more intuitive!

Lin Li

Special Development Skill Acquired: Something

Victor Aderinto

Working on this project, Victor gained valuable insights into the significance of rigorous unit and system testing practices. Through hands-on experience, he developed a deeper understanding of how these testing methodologies contribute to the reliability and stability of software applications.
